key_features: Page header with Mail icon and title
Uses 'use client' directive for client-side rendering
patterns: Consistent layout structure with header and content sections

file_insights.purpose: Sequence list display component with metrics and actions
key_features: TypeScript interface for EmailSequence data type
Status badges with icons (active, paused, draft)
Action menu with edit, duplicate, delete options

file_insights.purpose: Navigation update to include sequences link
changes: Added Mail icon import from lucide-react
Added sequences navigation item with /sequences href

patterns_discovered.name: Responsive Design Strategy
patterns_discovered.description: Uses Tailwind CSS hidden/md:block classes to provide separate desktop table and mobile card layouts

patterns_discovered.name: Status Indicator Pattern
patterns_discovered.description: Status badges with contextual icons and color coding (green=active, yellow=paused, gray=draft)
patterns_discovered.benefit: Clear visual communication of sequence state

patterns_discovered.name: Mock Data Architecture
patterns_discovered.description: MOCK_SEQUENCES constant providing realistic test data with complete metrics
patterns_discovered.benefit: Enables feature development without backend dependency

patterns_discovered.name: Component Documentation
patterns_discovered.description: Comprehensive JSDoc comments on interfaces, functions, and components

patterns_discovered.name: Icon-Driven UI
patterns_discovered.description: Consistent use of lucide-react icons for visual hierarchy and actions

patterns_discovered.name: Action Menu Pattern
patterns_discovered.description: Dropdown menu with MoreVertical icon, toggled by sequence ID state
patterns_discovered.benefit: Space-efficient action handling in table context

gotchas_discovered.description: Hardcoded MOCK_SEQUENCES with static values won't reflect actual usage patterns
gotchas_discovered.impact: Will need backend integration to show real sequence performance data

gotchas_discovered.description: Dropdown menu positioned with absolute/right-0 may overflow screen on mobile
gotchas_discovered.impact: Menu may be cut off on smaller viewports despite responsive design

gotchas_discovered.description: Table renders all sequences without pagination, lazy loading, or virtualization
gotchas_discovered.impact: Performance degradation if sequence count exceeds hundreds

gotchas_discovered.description: Empty state 'Create Your First Sequence' button lacks click handler
gotchas_discovered.impact: Users cannot create sequences from empty state UI

gotchas_discovered.description: Action menu stays open when clicking outside, only closes on same button click
gotchas_discovered.impact: Users must click the button again to close menu instead of anywhere outside

approach_outcome.description: Successfully created comprehensive sequences list page with metrics display and management UI
scope_completed: SequenceList component with desktop table and mobile card views
Key metrics display (subscribers, sent, open/click/conversion rates)
Sidebar navigation updated with sequences link
approach_outcome.code_organization: well-structured with clear separation of concerns
approach_outcome.responsiveness: dual layout approach (desktop table + mobile cards)

recommendations.recommendation: Replace MOCK_SEQUENCES with API call to fetch real sequence data
recommendations.implementation_notes: Create API endpoint that returns EmailSequence[] with real metrics from database

recommendations.recommendation: Implement click handlers for action menu buttons (Edit, Duplicate, Delete)
recommendations.implementation_notes: Navigate to edit page, call duplicate endpoint, show delete confirmation modal

recommendations.recommendation: Implement Create Sequence button handler in page header
recommendations.implementation_notes: Navigate to /sequences/create or open modal for sequence creation flow

recommendations.recommendation: Add click-outside handler to close action menu
recommendations.implementation_notes: Use useEffect with event listener or library like react-onclickoutside

recommendations.recommendation: Implement pagination or virtualization for large sequence lists
recommendations.implementation_notes: Consider react-table for pagination controls or react-window for virtualization

recommendations.recommendation: Add sorting and filtering capabilities to table (by status, metrics, date)
recommendations.implementation_notes: Add column headers as sortable buttons, implement sort state management

recommendations.recommendation: Improve menu accessibility with keyboard navigation
recommendations.implementation_notes: Add role='menu', keyboard handlers for Enter/Escape, focus management

recommendations.recommendation: Add loading skeleton while fetching sequence data
recommendations.implementation_notes: Create SequenceListSkeleton component with placeholder rows

recommendations.recommendation: Add bulk actions toolbar for multi-select sequences
recommendations.implementation_notes: Add checkboxes, selection state management, bulk delete/pause/resume
